overview: The world is what sound is: Main motive is the speaker - on masts, in halls, on roofs in cars, living rooms, in headphones and handsets, in radio installations. Listeners are to be seen in parts or blured only. Sound gets through the speakers, as unclear part of communication and dialogues, distorted music and announcements, search of transitions, noise. Volker Schreiner gives a new, a different, a forgotten voice to the general and omnipresent noise, that since a long time is no more experienced in the mordern world.
title: Scope
